Rules.Name: DebugHavingMeal
Rules.Content_SWRLTab: foaf:Person(?p) ^ alzheimer:Sit(?A1) ^ alzheimer:Eat(?A2) ^ mcontext:isInvolvedIn(?p, ?A1) ^ mcontext:isInvolvedIn(?p, ?A2) ^ activity:HighContextActivity(?HA) -> alzheimer:HavingMeal(?HA) ^ mcontext:isInvolvedIn(?p, ?HA) ^ sqwrl:select(?p, ?A1, ?A2, ?HA)
Rules.Content_Rules: Rule: Person(?p), Sit(?A1), Eat(?A2), isInvolvedIn(?p, ?A1), isInvolvedIn(?p, ?A2), HighContextActivity(?HA) -> HavingMeal(?HA), isInvolvedIn(?p, ?HA), select(?p, ?A1, ?A2, ?HA)
Rules.Description: Query to get the outputs of HavingMeal rule

Rules.Name: HavingMeal
Rules.Contenido_SWRLTab: foaf:Person(?p) ^ alzheimer:Sit(?A1) ^ alzheimer:Eat(?A2) ^ mcontext:isInvolvedIn(?p, ?A1) ^ mcontext:isInvolvedIn(?p, ?A2) ^ activity:HighContextActivity(?HA) -> alzheimer:HavingMeal(?HA) ^ mcontext:isInvolvedIn(?p, ?HA)
Rules.Contenido_Rules: Rule: Person(?p), Sit(?A1), Eat(?A2), isInvolvedIn(?p, ?A1), isInvolvedIn(?p, ?A2), HighContextActivity(?HA) -> HavingMeal(?HA), isInvolvedIn(?p, ?HA)
Rules.Description: Discovery of the having meal activity.

Rules.Name: Rest

Rules.State: Wrong - All HLactivities with one Sit are resting
